## Worm.setIsBipartite() method

Sets the bipartite property of the given session.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setIsBipartite(session: number, bipartite: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  session | number | The Worm session to be targeted. |
|  bipartite | boolean | Wether or not the current Worm is bipartite. |

**Returns:**

void
